plot: Lisa gives Ralph a Valentine's card out of pity, but soon regrets it when he develops an unwanted crush on her.

Feeling sorry for Ralph, Lisa sends him a Valentine card. Having developed a crush on her, Ralph invites Lisa to go see the Krusty the Clown show. She accepts but after Krusty asks them if they are boyfriend and girlfriend, Lisa lets Ralph know that she just wants them to be friends.—wodder-1
